data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Kortrijk get the game underway.
At Jan Breydel Stadium, Hannes Van Der Bruggen has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Brugge kick-off.
Jovan Stojanovic (Kortrijk) has received a yellow card from Lothar D Hondt.
In the minute 59, Philippe Clement is making the team's first substitution at Jan Breydel Stadium with Michael Krmencik replacing Youssouph Badji.
Noa Lang scores to make it 1-0 at Jan Breydel Stadium.
Trent Sainsbury (Kortrijk) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 70, Timothy Derijck is replacing Jovan Stojanovic for Kortrijk at Jan Breydel Stadium.
The home team replace Noa Lang with David Okereke.
Odilon Kossounou is on a sub for Krepin Diatta for Brugge.
In the minute 86, The away team have replaced Michiel Jonckheere with Yani Van Den Bossche. This is the second substitution made today by Yves Vanderhaeghe.
Yves Vanderhaeghe (Kortrijk) is making a third substitution, with Petar Golubovic replacing Eric Ocansey.
